verses.verse: לְדָוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid, of David מִ֫זְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor [A] Psalm נְאֻ֤ם <S%H5002><s%> ne-'Um said יְהוָ֨ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD לַֽאדֹנִ֗י <S%H113><s%> la-do-Ni, unto my Lord שֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> shev Sit לִֽימִינִ֑י <S%H3225><s%> li-mi-Ni; thou at my right hand עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- Until אָשִׁ֥ית <S%H7896><s%> 'a-Shit until I make אֹ֝יְבֶ֗יךָ <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-Vei-cha, thine enemies הֲדֹ֣ם <S%H1916><s%> ha-Dom stool לְרַגְלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H7272><s%> le-rag-Lei-cha. your feet

מַטֵּֽה־ <S%H4294><s%> mat-teh- the rod עֻזְּךָ֗ <S%H5797><s%> 'uz-ze-Cha, of thy strength יִשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> yish-Lach shall send יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD מִצִּיּ֑וֹן <S%H6726><s%> mitz-tzi-Yon; out of Zion רְ֝דֵ֗ה <S%H7287><s%> re-Deh, rule בְּקֶ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> be-Ke-rev thou in the midst אֹיְבֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-Vei-cha. of thine enemies

עַמְּךָ֣ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-me-Cha Thy people נְדָבֹת֮ <S%H5071><s%> ne-da-Vot [shall be] willing בְּי֪וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom in the day חֵ֫ילֶ֥ךָ <S%H2428><s%> chei-Le-cha of thy power בְּֽהַדְרֵי־ <S%H1926><s%> be-had-rei- in the beauties קֹ֭דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> Ko-desh of holiness מֵרֶ֣חֶם <S%H7358><s%> me-Re-chem from the womb מִשְׁחָ֑ר <S%H4891><s%> mish-Char; of the morning לְ֝ךָ֗ le-cha, טַ֣ל <S%H2919><s%> tal thou hast the dew יַלְדֻתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H3208><s%> yal-du-Tei-cha. of thy youth

נִשְׁבַּ֤ע <S%H7650><s%> nish-Ba' hath sworn יְהוָ֨ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo and will not יִנָּחֵ֗ם <S%H5162><s%> yin-na-Chem, and will not repent אַתָּֽה־ <S%H859><s%> 'at-tah- you כֹהֵ֥ן <S%H3548><s%> cho-Hen Thou [art] a priest לְעוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam; for ever עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- According דִּ֝בְרָתִ֗י <S%H1700><s%> div-ra-Ti, after the order מַלְכִּי־ mal-ki- צֶֽדֶק׃ <S%H4442><s%> Tze-dek. of Melchizedek

אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai The Lord עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- is at יְמִֽינְךָ֑ <S%H3225><s%> ye-mi-ne-Cha; at thy right hand מָחַ֖ץ <S%H4272><s%> ma-Chatz shall strike בְּיוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> be-yom- in the day אַפּ֣וֹ <S%H639><s%> ap-Po of his wrath מְלָכִֽים׃ <S%H4428><s%> me-la-Chim. through kings

יָדִ֣ין <S%H1777><s%> ya-Din He shall judge בַּ֭גּוֹיִם <S%H1471><s%> Bag-go-yim among the heathen מָלֵ֣א <S%H4390><s%> ma-Le he shall fill גְוִיּ֑וֹת <S%H1472><s%> ge-vi-Yot; [the places] with the dead bodies מָ֥חַץ <S%H4272><s%> Ma-chatz he shall wound רֹ֝֗אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> Rosh, the heads עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz countries רַבָּֽה׃ <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bah. over many

מִ֭נַּחַל <S%H5158><s%> Min-na-chal of the brook בַּדֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> bad-De-rech in the way יִשְׁתֶּ֑ה <S%H8354><s%> yish-Teh; He shall drink עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and כֵּ֝֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Ken, after that יָרִ֥ים <S%H7311><s%> ya-Rim therefore shall he lift up רֹֽאשׁ׃ <S%H7218><s%> Rosh. the head
